amendment.description: Amendment authorizes funds to the Secretary to design and develop a pilot electric cargo conveyor system for the transportation of containers from ports to depots outside of urban areas.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 110-371 to authorize funds to the Secretary to design and develop a pilot electric cargo conveyor system for the transportation of containers from ports to depots outside of urban areas.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rohrabacher amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
